attributes.action: Allow a vote of no confidence in the Current Labour Government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allow a vote of no confidence in the Current Labour Government, due to major inconsistencies between the current manifesto and the reversal of the included referendum on the EU Treaty/Constitution 
By a simple name change and officially acknowledged rewording without major change of the aforementioned documents, the agreement was not changed in sufficient form to warrant the denial of democratic process.
Leading Labour to knowingly misrepresent themselves, to gain political power for a further term in Government office.
